document.full_text: rising waters forced evacuations in minot, north dakota, on tuesday as officials in south dakota raced to finish levees to protect the state capital and other cities from the swollen missouri river.
document.title: flooding forces north dakota evacuations
lines_and_colors: rising waters forced evacuations in minot, north dakota, on tuesday as officials in south dakota raced to finish levees to protect the state capital and other cities from the swollen missouri river.
